tuv.seg: Registration of health and social care professionals
Clárú gairmithe sláinte agus cúraim shóisialaigh
CORU is the regulator for health and social care professionals
Is é CORU an rialálaí le haghaidh gairmithe sláinte agus cúraim shóisialaigh
Its role is to protect the public by promoting high standards of professional conduct, education, training and competence through statutory registration of health and social care professionals

Is é an ról atá aige ná an pobal a chosaint trí chaighdeáin arda iompair ghairmiúil, oideachais, oiliúna agus inniúlachta a chur chun cinn trí bhíthin chlárú reachtúil na ngairmithe sláinte agus cúraim shóisialaigh
It was set up under the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005, (as amended)
Bunaíodh é faoin Acht um Ghairmithe Sláinte agus Cúraim Shóisialaigh 2005 (pdf) (arna leasú)
The system of statutory registration will apply to the following 12 health and social care professions, regardless of whether they work in the public or private sector or are self-employed:

Bainfidh an córas um chlárú reachtúil faoi láthair leis an 12 ghairm sláinte agus cúraim shóisialaigh seo a leanas, beag beann ar cibé acu a oibríonn siad san earnáil phoiblí nó san earnáil phríobháideach nó atá siad féinfhostaithe;

The registers for dietitians, occupational therapists, optometrists/dispensing opticians, physiotherapists, radiographers/radiation therapists, social workers, and speech and language therapists are open

Tá na cláir d’oibrithe sóisialta, teiripeoirí ceirde, optaiméadraithe/radharceolaithe dáilte, fisiteiripeoirí, radagrafaithe/teiripeoirí radaíochta, diaitéitigh, agus teiripeoirí urlabhra agus teanga ar oscailt
Once a register opens, there is a two-year transitional period after which only professionals on the Register are legally allowed to use the professional title
Bíonn idirthréimhse dhá bhliain ann ach a n-osclaítear clár, nach gceadaítear ach amháin do ghairmithe ar an gClár chun leas a bhaint as an teideal gairmiúil
Complaints – Fitness to Practise
Gearáin - Oiriúnacht chun Cleachtadh
CORU handles complaints about the fitness to practice of registered health and social care professionals
Láimhseálann CORU gearáin faoi oiriúnacht chun cleachtaidh gairmithe cláraithe sláinte agus cúraim shóisialta
This may include, for example, complaints of professional misconduct or poor professional performance
D’fhéadfaí a áireamh leis seo, mar shampla, gearáin faoi mhí-iompar gairmiúil nó drochfheidhmíocht ghairmiúil
CORU can only look into events that have occurred since 31 December 2014, when it started accepting complaints
Ní féidir le CORU ach imeachtaí a fhiosrú a tharla ón 31 Nollaig 2014, nuair a thosaigh siad ag glacadh le gearáin
To make a complaint about a registered practitioner, complete CORU’s Fitness to Practise complaint form
Chun gearán a dhéanamh faoi chleachtóir cláraithe, comhlánaigh foirm ghearáin um Oiriúnacht chun Cleachtaidh CORU
Further information on the Fitness to Practise complaints process is available on the CORU website and there is a CORU Guide to Fitness to Practise (pdf)
Tá breis faisnéise ar an bpróiseas gearáin um Oiriúnacht chun Cleachtaidh ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin CORU agus tá Treoir maidir le hOiriúnacht chun Cleachtaidh (pdf) ann
If you wish to make a complaint against a Health and Social Care Professional who is not registered with CORU see healthcomplaints.ie
Más mian leat gearán a dhéanamh i leith Gairmí Sláinte agus Cúraim Shóisialta nach bhfuil cláraithe le CORU, féach healthcomplaints.ie
